--0-1589346571-1186003225=:69097
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

::Lord Elder::

Deep within The Watcher headquarters signals go off, waking the Watcher leader.

Elder: What in the hell?

He checks the monitoring systems that The Watchers have set up around the planet.

Elder: One of the Predacon camps looks like their mobalizing to attack Relay. Wonderful. Sometimes I think The Minions are easier to deal... What's this?

Elder locks onto a new signature.

Elder: It's Decepticon, but not a normal Con signal. Something new. Something different.

He opens a comm to his men.

Elder: Watchers: I believe a new twist in these Beast Wars has happened. I want Watchers at Relay ASAP. Do not get involved unless I order it but I want to study the battle there. Right now the Silver Wing Maximals are dealing with some kind of new Decepticon but it appears that Predacons are moving to attack as well. Elder out.

       
---------------------------------
